paper_abstract: Extensions of Sanov's Theorem and the Conditional Limit Theorem (COLT) are established for a multicolor Polya-Eggenberger (PE) urn sampling scheme, giving the Polya information divergence and a Polya extension to the Maximum Relative Entropy (MaxEnt) method. Polya MaxEnt includes the standard MaxEnt, as well as its variants used in Bose-Einstein. Fermi-Dirac and intermediate (Acharya-Swamy) statistics, as special cases. In the PE setting, standard MaxEnt is, in general, asymptotically inconsistent. (C) 2010 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
